product.description:
Item #: 4101

Cherokee Scrubs Authentic Workwear - Fashion meets function with stylin' prices. Spruce up your scrubs collection with these pants available in great colors.

Be fashion forward in flare leg pants. A simple matching drawstring, the perfect shape from the flare and subtle leg slits mean you'll never be out of style in these pants.

  • Two side pockets
  • One back pocket
  • Drawstring front/elastic back
  • Flare leg with side slits at the bottom
  • Made with 65% polyester/35% cotton, white is made with 55% cotton/45% polyester
  • Regular inseam 30 1/2", petite 28 1/2", and tall 33 1/2".

    Extended sizes may be priced differently. Please see pricing after selecting color and size options.

    *Please note that this item is excluded from any discounts or coupons.*
product.name: Scrubs - Cherokee Authentic Workwear Flare Leg Scrub Pant
